verses.name: Colossians 1:13
verses.text: Who hath delivered us from the power of darkness, and hath translated us into the kingdom of his dear Son:

verses.name: Colossians 1:14
verses.text: In whom we have redemption through his blood, even the forgiveness of sins:

verses.name: Colossians 1:15
verses.text: Who is the image of the invisible God, the firstborn of every creature:

verses.name: Colossians 1:16
verses.text: For by him were all things created, that are in heaven, and that are in earth, visible and invisible, whether they be thrones, or dominions, or principalities, or powers: all things were created by him, and for him:

verses.name: Colossians 1:17
verses.text: And he is before all things, and by him all things consist.
